name: part_008
file: tmp_【 #アキロゼ5周年Live 】ーHistoric ROUTE ５ー￤3DLIVE【ホロライブ⧸アキ・ローゼンタール】 [hURqBaVxnSg]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_008.mov

scenes.description: Hololive members Aki Rosenthal, Shirakami Fubuki, Natsuiro Matsuri, and Oozora Subaru perform 'Our Bright Parade' accompanied by a marching band.
A transition interlude featuring a solo drum performance and a drum ensemble routine by Aki Rosenthal.
Aki Rosenthal begins her solo performance of 'Kimi ni Matsuwaru Unmei Jijou' on a city-themed stage.

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: Lalala...

subtitles.original: ラララ...
subtitles.english: Lalala...

subtitles.original: 始まりたくて走った
subtitles.english: I ran because I wanted to begin.

subtitles.original: 遠く暗がりに灯った
subtitles.english: It was lit up in the distant darkness.

subtitles.original: それは眩しすぎた名前
subtitles.english: That name was too dazzling.

subtitles.original: それは優しすぎた思い出
subtitles.english: That memory was too kind.

subtitles.original: もっと
subtitles.english: More...

subtitles.original: 近づけと手を伸ばした
subtitles.english: ...I reached out to bring it closer.

subtitles.original: 思いがけず結び合ったら
subtitles.english: When we unexpectedly became connected...

subtitles.original: ほら今 My Bright Parade 鳴りました
subtitles.english: Look, now My Bright Parade has begun!

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade! It's shining!

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring your frustrations and your affections along.

subtitles.original: 風呼んで羽 飛び立てるさ
subtitles.english: Call the wind, and we can fly away.

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光 終わりなき兆し
subtitles.english: A humble prayer is light, a never-ending sign.

subtitles.original: 君を見つけたこと胸を張れるよ
subtitles.english: I can be proud that I found you.

subtitles.original: ここから これから Our Bright Parade Parade
subtitles.english: From here on, from now on, Our Bright Parade, Parade.

subtitles.original: ただいまを聞けば お帰りと叫ぶよ
subtitles.english: When I hear "I'm home," I'll shout "Welcome back!"

subtitles.original: 当たり前じゃないか
subtitles.english: Isn't it only natural?

subtitles.original: パレパレパレ 輝くんだよ
subtitles.english: Parade, parade, parade! It's shining!

subtitles.original: 悔しさも愛おしさも連れておいで
subtitles.english: Bring your frustrations and your affections along.

subtitles.original: 風呼んで羽 飛び立てるさ
subtitles.english: Call the wind, and we can fly away.

subtitles.original: ささやかな祈りは光 終わりなき兆し
subtitles.english: A humble prayer is light, a never-ending sign.

subtitles.original: 君と飛び込んでゆく ステラな高さ
subtitles.english: Diving in with you to stellar heights.

subtitles.original: ここから これから Our Bright Parade Parade
subtitles.english: From here on, from now on, Our Bright Parade, Parade.

subtitles.original: Our Bright Parade Parade
subtitles.english: Our Bright Parade Parade.

subtitles.original: イェーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 最高！
subtitles.english: That was great!

subtitles.original: 楽しかった！
subtitles.english: So much fun!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: Thank you!
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: キミにまつわる運命事情
subtitles.english: The Destiny Surrounding You

subtitles.original: 今日は絶好調 そのはずでした滑稽
subtitles.english: Today I was in top form... or so I thought. How comical.

subtitles.original: 天気予報ド外れ
subtitles.english: The weather forecast was completely off.

subtitles.original: ドア閉まるバス 憂鬱 Monday
subtitles.english: Bus doors closing, a gloomy Monday.

subtitles.original: なんて不条理 文句誰行き？
subtitles.english: How irrational. Who can I complain to?

subtitles.original: 八つ当たりは問題外
subtitles.english: Venting is out of the question.

subtitles.original: どうしようもないこと多すぎ Everyday
subtitles.english: Too many things I can't do anything about, everyday.
